subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Sam Perlozzo was fired as Baltimore’s manager yesterday, the result of his inability to bring the last-place Orioles out of a lengthy slump that culminated in an eight-game losing streak. He was the first major league manager to be fired this year.
